text: "Only When You Leave" is a 1984 song by English new wave band Spandau Ballet and is the leading single from their fourth studio album Parade. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom, Greece and the Netherlands, number 34 in the United States, number 10 in New Zealand, number 12 in Australia, number 2 in Ireland, number 20 in Switzerland and number 23 in Canada. ==Formats and track listings== *7-inch single # "Only When You Leave" – 4:48 # "Paint Me Down" (live) – 4:39 *12-inch single # "Only When You Leave" (extended mix) –6:45 # "Only When You Leave" –4:48 # "Paint Me Down" (live) – 4:39 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Spandau Ballet songs
